name: Space Rogue (itch) (taylom22)
description:
Space Rogue is an early prototype for a bullet-heaven rogue-lite influenced by the space shooters of our yesteryears.

I began development on May 6th, 2022 and hope to bring persistent progression through many upgrades, a number of weapons, abilities, ships, enemies, and levels to the game. 

The game adapts to any resolution. Feel free to resize the window or go fullscreen by pressing Alt+Enter.

There are currently three control schemes. I recommend practicing with the default control scheme, as it gives you more control and is more rewarding once you figure it out. But if you find it too difficult, there are two other, easier control schemes included, but I haven't fine tuned them yet. Change control scheme at any time by pressing TAB/Share
